name: Cinnamon Syrup
preparation:
This easy-to-make simple syrup is infused with cinnamon sticks. It can be used to add sweetness and a touch of cinnamon spice to a variety of cocktails.

Add all the ingredients to a small saucepan.

Bring to a boil over high heat, reduce heat to low and simmer for a few minutes.

Remove from heat, cover, and let stand for at least 6 hours.

Strain, and store in the refrigerator.
